articles.content:
BANGKOK - Thailand is not blocking exports of the AstraZeneca vaccine, a government representative said, after Taiwan said Thailand was keeping for itself doses of the vaccine that it is producing.

articles.author: Karan Thapar
articles.title: Watch | 'Widely Spaced Doses of Covishield Is Not the Right Way to Go' - The Wire Science
articles.description: In conversation with Karan Thapar, Dr K. Srinath Reddy of the Public Health Foundation of India says studies reinforce concerns about the inadequacy of a single dose of the AstraZeneca vaccine vis-à-vis the Delta variant.
articles.content:
Karan Thapar in conversation with Dr K. Srinath Reddy of the Public Health Foundation of India.
